Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the Bank of Thailand did not release the statistics on retirement as claimed.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the impact of retirement on Thai people by stating that 48% of them are struggling and have to work hard even in old age.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times in the provided information.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on false statistics that were not released by the Bank of Thailand.
Problematic assumption: There is no evidence of a problematic assumption in the provided claim.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the statistics posted on social media claiming to be from the Bank of Thailand are not correct and the bank has never conducted these statistics.
